articles.author: Nate Williams
articles.title: 5 Handy Costco Gadgets To Upgrade Your Smart Home - SlashGear
articles.description: Smart home devices are everywhere, but you don't need to visit more than one store in order to fully upgrade your home with the latest tech.
articles.content: Home security technology has come a long way from touchy motion detectors and buggy cameras that miss the important things. This 13-piece smart security system from SimpliSafe is proof of that evolut… [+792 chars]
